examples: Being near running water and good shade, the explorers decided it was a good locale for setting up camp.

definitions.definition: The set of settings related to the language and region in which a computer program executes. Examples are language, currency and time formats, character encoding etc.

A partially ordered set with the following additional axiomatic properties: any finite subset of it has a meet , any arbitrary subset of it has a join , and distributivity , which states that a binary meet distributes with respect to an arbitrary join. (Note: locales are just like frame s except that the category of locales is opposite to the category of frames.)

secondary_definitions: ( computing ) The set of settings related to the language and region in which a computer program executes. Examples are language, currency and time formats, character encoding etc.

( mathematics ) A partially ordered set with the following additional axiomatic properties: any finite subset of it has a meet , any arbitrary subset of it has a join , and distributivity , which states that a binary meet distributes with respect to an arbitrary join. (Note: locales are just like frame s except that the category of locales is opposite to the category of frames.)
